DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the long term efficacy and safety of the CODMAN TRUFILL®'s line of coils in the treatment of patients with intracranial ruptured or non-ruptured aneurysms in real-life routine clinical practice.
DOC.brief_title: TRUfill®'s Line in Intracranial aNeurysm Embolisation
DOC.criteria: Patient ≥ 18 years old Patient presenting one or more ruptured or nonruptured intracranial aneurysms assessed by angiography Patient implanted with one or more CODMAN TRUFILL® coils Patient agree to take part in the study, or agreement of a representative of the patient in case of patient inability, after being informed by the investigator and have received information letter. Patient who does not accept to take part in the study after being informed Patient already enrolled in a clinical trial involving experimental medication or device.
